keyword: calories in fat free cottage cheese
title: Calories in Fat Free Cottage Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in fat free cottage cheese per 100g, including protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in Fat Free Cottage Cheese
assumptions: Fat-free (0% milkfat), small curd, plain variety, no added flavors or fruits.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, curd size, added ingredients, and processing; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 100g of fat-free cottage cheese provides about 72 kcal and 10g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g fat free cottage cheese?
What's the protein content in fat free cottage cheese?
Does fat free cottage cheese have carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, about 6.7g carbs, including 2.7g sugars, per 100g.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in fat free cottage cheese?
faqs.a: Around 364mg sodium per 100g; opt for low-sodium versions if needed.

faqs.q: Calories in 1 cup fat free cottage cheese?
faqs.a: A 226g cup has about 163 kcal, scaled from per-100g values.
